field.label: Enabled
field.help: This will enable or disable the usergroup account.

field.label: Group Name
field.help: Set the unique group name for the usergroup. Allowed characters are 0-9, a-z, A-Z, and ._-

field.label: Simultaneous Use
field.help: Set the simultaneous use for the usergroup. its range from 1 to 10. if you want to remove it, leave it empty.

field.label: Description
field.help: Given name, last name, or anything you need to describe.

field.label: Authentication Type
field.help: Set the authentication type of each usergroup group.

field.label: Reply Message
field.help: Reply message return a message after authentication for usergroup group, empty message does not involved in the process.

field.label: Mikrotik VLAN
field.help: Set the Mikrotik VLAN ID and type attribute. Mikrotik uses own attributes for VLAN assignment and for VLAN type use a value of 0 is fine.

field.label: WISPr Bandwith
field.help: Set the bandwith for WISPr attribute. The value is treated as bits/s.

field.label: ChilliSpot Bandwith
field.help: Set the bandwith for ChilliSpot attribute. The value is treated as kbits/s.

field.label: Login Time
field.help: Set the Login-Time. This can be used by the Captive Portal.

field.label: Max Daily Session
field.help: Set the maximum daily session limit. This can be used by the Captive Portal.
